function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 due to reduced traffic flow and movement restrictions","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, ensure mask usage, and promote vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems, and temperature screening technology","People":"General population, commuters, and urban residents","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and transportation organizations"},{"Description":"Decreased traffic flow leading to improved air quality and reduced noise levels","Impact":"Potential complacency in maintaining clean air and noise reduction measures","Mitigation":"Sustain and expand environmental measures, enforce emissions standards, and promote sustainable transportation","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, noise level monitoring devices, and sustainable transportation options","People":"Environmental agencies, urban planners, and public health advocates","Owner":"Local governments, environmental organizations, and transportation authorities"}]}
